alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Western Essex (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 2:48PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Essex, northeastern Worcester and northeastern Middlesex Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 247 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Groton, or 9 miles southwest of Nashua, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Lowell, Methuen, Billerica, Chelmsford, Andover, Dracut, Tewksbury, Burlington, Wilmington, Westford, Acton, Bedford, Pepperell, Tyngsborough, Groton, Townsend, Littleton, Lancaster, Ayer and Shirley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Western Essex
